bug.author: Kyeongpil
bug.description: In the documentation (guide.rst), I found a very trivial typo. mode = GPipe(model, balance=[1, 1, 1, 1], devices=[4, 5, 6, 7], # Specify GPUs. chunks=8) should be changed to model = GPipe(model, balance=[1, 1, 1, 1], devices=[4, 5, 6, 7], # Specify GPUs. chunks=8) i.e. the variable name 'mode' should be changed to 'model'.

comments.comment: I fixed it. Thanks for reporting.
